HomeWiki:
Project Description
A control suite of Unity3D components being made.

(Currently only PieChart and Date are available)
- Pie/Donut/Line/Bar/Area Chart
- Human Map
- US Map


How to Use:

Create a new Unity3D project and bring in the Assets and ProjectSettings into your project, then run the Main Scene for an example.

In your own project drag in a JohnnyUIPieChart to an empty GameObject, define a TextMesh to use as a font template, and set the various parameters. You can either attach the pie values as objects at design time or implement at run time.

The scene will give warnings about cleaning up leaked meshes this is only because I have the editor update in Unity every time you change something, and it generates a dynamic Mesh object. Afaik the warning can be safely ignored.
